<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Enable responsive dashboard property for net new and upgrading customers.
- Fix script on upgrade to set the property "glide.cms.enable.responsive_grid_layout" to true if it exists and equals to false.</description>
        <name>Enable responsive dashboard property</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.log('START - Enable responsive dashboard property');
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
gr.addQuery('name', 'glide.cms.enable.responsive_grid_layout');
gr.addQuery('value', 'false');
gr.query();

if (gr.next()) {
    gs.log('glide.cms.enable.responsive_grid_layout with value false is found.');
    gr.setValue('value', 'true');
    gr.update();
    gs.log('Updated glide.cms.enable.responsive_grid_layout property to true.');
}
gs.log('END - Enable responsive dashboard property');]]></script>
